G

Game - Class in systemModel
Contains the state and logic for an implementation of the game.
Game(int) - Constructor for class systemModel.Game
Constructs a game with a grid of the given size, using a default random number generator.
Game(int, Random) - Constructor for class systemModel.Game
Constructs a game with a grid of the given size, using the given instance of Random for the random number generator.
game - Variable in class ui.GamePanel
The Game instance for which this is the UI.
GameMain - Class in ui
Main class for the GUI for a 2048 game.

GamePanel - Class in ui
User interface for the main grid
GamePanel(Game, ScorePanel, boolean, boolean) - Constructor for class ui.GamePanel

GamePanel.MyKeyListener - Class in ui
